creditline: Gift of Mrs. Keith Merrill in memory of her husband, Mr. Keith Merrill
description: Wood with embroidered seat and back; with escudos (arms) of the Pope; As the fabric was worn, the embroidery has been appliqued to the new material.  The chairs follow the conventional lines, with fluted front supports and carved front cross panel.
title: Armchair (frailero), one of a pair
